message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product.  Given its value, I think $14,000 is a fair price. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a significant drop from my initial offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?  This product is truly worth it.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I can only consider an offer around $11,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
